text: Thumma 'Antum Ha'uula' Taqtuluna 'Anfusakum Wa Tukhrijuna Fariqaan Minkum Min Diyarihim Tazaharuna `Alayhim Bil-'Ithmi Wa Al-`Udwani Wa 'In Ya'tukum 'Usara Tufaduhum Wa Huwa Muharramun `Alaykum 'Ikhrajuhum 'A Fatu'uminuna Biba`đi Al-Kitabi Wa Takfuruna Biba`đin Fama Jaza'u Man Yaf`alu Dhalika Minkum 'Illa Khizyun Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Yawma Al-Qiyamati Yuradduna 'Ila 'Ashaddi Al-`Adhabi Wa Ma Allahu Bighafilin `Amma Ta`maluna
